entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
